website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a basic and affordable cell phone for just making calls, the Samsung SPH-M300 delivers with style. However, if you want a good camera phone, look elsewhere.
pros: The Samsung SPH-M300 features a stylish and compact design
The cell phone also offers integrated Bluetooth and good call quality
cons: The M300's VGA camera produced poor pictures
Speakerphone volume is weak, and there's only 8MB of internal memory with no expandable media

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I had originally received this phone for free when originally joining Sprint with a two year contract. It is a simple phone that fails often. I take good care of my electronics. I never dropped this phone or did anything else to it that would result in damage. It froze often, would overheat, and would randomly shut off. After only a year of owning it (I only used it for phone calls and texting), the screen became permanently white. Nothing would fix it and Sprint would not replace it. I purchased a refurbished one so that I could finish out my contract. It is a poor phone and I can only say that it was a disappointment... even for free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, SAVE YOUR TIME and MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this basic phone for my mom to only find out it doesn't charge. I had to buy the charge separately, so I had to wait for both to arrive on time. Although the phone was fully charge when it was shipped, I plug it to the charger, and nothing happen. I waited for hours... Nothing.... Do not buy. Note: my phone did have a clear esn. But still, what's an active phone when it can't be charged and used? Waste of time and money.

product_meta.title: Samsung SPH-M300 Feature Phone Sprint
product_meta.description: The Samsung SPH-M300 is a thinner and lighter update to the A640, with enhanced talking menu feature for the vision impaired and hands-free use. Other key features of this model include Bluetooth compatibility, a VGA camera, dual color displays, Java, GPS, voice dialing, and SMS messaging capability. This phone also supports multiple languages including Spanish.
